title: R6 class for a dbi connection, see connector_dbi (used to interact with DBI compliant database backends) — Connector_dbi_object
code: # Create DBI connector  db <- connector::Connector_dbi$new(RSQLite::SQLite(), ":memory:")  db #> <Connector_dbi> #>   Public: #>     disconnect: function ()  #>     get_conn: function ()  #>     initialize: function (drv, ...)  #>     list_content: function (...)  #>     read: function (name, ...)  #>     remove: function (name, ...)  #>     tbl: function (name, ...)  #>     write: function (x, name, ...)  #>   Private: #>     conn: SQLiteConnection #>     finalize: function ()   # Write to the database  db$write(iris, "iris")  # Read from the database  db$read("iris") |>   head(5) #>   Sepal.Length Sepal.Width Petal.Length Petal.Width Species #> 1          5.1         3.5          1.4         0.2  setosa #> 2          4.9         3.0          1.4         0.2  setosa #> 3          4.7         3.2          1.3         0.2  setosa #> 4          4.6         3.1          1.5         0.2  setosa #> 5          5.0         3.6          1.4         0.2  setosa  # List available tables  db$list_content() #> [1] "iris"  # Use the connector to run a query  db$get_conn() |>   DBI::dbGetQuery("SELECT * FROM iris limit 5") #>   Sepal.Length Sepal.Width Petal.Length Petal.Width Species #> 1          5.1         3.5          1.4         0.2  setosa #> 2          4.9         3.0          1.4         0.2  setosa #> 3          4.7         3.2          1.3         0.2  setosa #> 4          4.6         3.1          1.5         0.2  setosa #> 5          5.0         3.6          1.4         0.2  setosa  # Use dplyr verbs and collect data  db$tbl("iris") |>   dplyr::filter(Sepal.Length > 7) |>   dplyr::collect() #> # A tibble: 12 × 5 #>    Sepal.Length Sepal.Width Petal.Length Petal.Width Species   #>           <dbl>       <dbl>        <dbl>       <dbl> <chr>     #>  1          7.1         3            5.9         2.1 virginica #>  2          7.6         3            6.6         2.1 virginica #>  3          7.3         2.9          6.3         1.8 virginica #>  4          7.2         3.6          6.1         2.5 virginica #>  5          7.7         3.8          6.7         2.2 virginica #>  6          7.7         2.6          6.9         2.3 virginica #>  7          7.7         2.8          6.7         2   virginica #>  8          7.2         3.2          6           1.8 virginica #>  9          7.2         3            5.8         1.6 virginica #> 10          7.4         2.8          6.1         1.9 virginica #> 11          7.9         3.8          6.4         2   virginica #> 12          7.7         3            6.1         2.3 virginica  # Disconnect from the database  db$disconnect()

text: new connector_dbi object

title: Create a new DBI connector object to interact with DBI compliant database backends — connector_dbi
text: extra_class parameter allows create subclass connector_dbi object. can useful want create custom connection object easier dispatch new s3 methods, still inheriting methods connector_dbi object.

title: Create a new DBI connector object to interact with DBI compliant database backends — connector_dbi
code: # Connect to in memory SQLite database  db <- connector_dbi(RSQLite::SQLite(), ":memory:")  db #> <Connector_dbi> #>   Public: #>     disconnect: function ()  #>     get_conn: function ()  #>     initialize: function (drv, ...)  #>     list_content: function (...)  #>     read: function (name, ...)  #>     remove: function (name, ...)  #>     tbl: function (name, ...)  #>     write: function (x, name, ...)  #>   Private: #>     conn: SQLiteConnection #>     finalize: function ()   # Create subclass connection  db_subclass <- connector_dbi(RSQLite::SQLite(), ":memory:", extra_class = "subclass")  db_subclass #> <subclass> #>   Inherits from: <Connector_dbi> #>   Public: #>     disconnect: function ()  #>     get_conn: function ()  #>     initialize: function (drv, ...)  #>     list_content: function (...)  #>     read: function (name, ...)  #>     remove: function (name, ...)  #>     tbl: function (name, ...)  #>     write: function (x, name, ...)  #>   Private: #>     conn: SQLiteConnection #>     finalize: function ()  class(db_subclass) #> [1] "subclass"      "Connector_dbi" "R6"

title: Create FS connector — connector_fs
text: extra_class parameter allows create subclass Connector_fs object. can useful want create custom connection object easier dispatch new s3 methods, still inheriting methods Connector_fs object.

title: Create FS connector — connector_fs
code: # Connect to a file system  path_to_adam <- system.file("demo_trial", "adam", package = "connector") db <- connector_fs(path_to_adam)  db #> <Connector_fs> #>   Public: #>     clone: function (deep = FALSE)  #>     construct_path: function (...)  #>     initialize: function (path, access = "rw")  #>     list_content: function (...)  #>     read: function (name, ...)  #>     remove: function (file)  #>     write: function (x, file, ...)  #>   Private: #>     path: /home/runner/work/_temp/Library/connector/demo_trial/adam  # Create subclass connection  db_subclass <- connector_fs(path_to_adam, extra_class = "subclass")  db_subclass #> <subclass> #>   Inherits from: <Connector_fs> #>   Public: #>     clone: function (deep = FALSE)  #>     construct_path: function (...)  #>     initialize: function (path, access = "rw")  #>     list_content: function (...)  #>     read: function (name, ...)  #>     remove: function (file)  #>     write: function (x, file, ...)  #>   Private: #>     path: /home/runner/work/_temp/Library/connector/demo_trial/adam class(db_subclass) #> [1] "subclass"     "Connector_fs" "R6"

title: Read a file based on this extension — read_ext
code: temp_csv <- tempfile("iris", fileext = ".csv") write.csv(iris, temp_csv, row.names = FALSE) class(temp_csv) <- "csv" read_ext(temp_csv) #> Rows: 150 Columns: 5 #> ── Column specification ──────────────────────────────────────────────────────── #> Delimiter: "," #> chr (1): Species #> dbl (4): Sepal.Length, Sepal.Width, Petal.Length, Petal.Width #>  #> ℹ Use `spec()` to retrieve the full column specification for this data. #> ℹ Specify the column types or set `show_col_types = FALSE` to quiet this message. #> # A tibble: 150 × 5 #>    Sepal.Length Sepal.Width Petal.Length Petal.Width Species #>           <dbl>       <dbl>        <dbl>       <dbl> <chr>   #>  1          5.1         3.5          1.4         0.2 setosa  #>  2          4.9         3            1.4         0.2 setosa  #>  3          4.7         3.2          1.3         0.2 setosa  #>  4          4.6         3.1          1.5         0.2 setosa  #>  5          5           3.6          1.4         0.2 setosa  #>  6          5.4         3.9          1.7         0.4 setosa  #>  7          4.6         3.4          1.4         0.3 setosa  #>  8          5           3.4          1.5         0.2 setosa  #>  9          4.4         2.9          1.4         0.2 setosa  #> 10          4.9         3.1          1.5         0.1 setosa  #> # title: Read and parse yaml configuration file — read_yaml_config
code: yaml_file <- system.file("config", "test_env_config.yml", package = "connector") yaml::read_yaml(yaml_file, eval.expr = TRUE) |> str() #> List of 4 #>  $ metadata   :List of 4 #>   ..$ trial      : chr "demo_trial" #>   ..$ root_path  : chr "/home/runner/work/_temp/Library/connector" #>   ..$ extra_class: chr "{env.hello}" #>   ..$ R          : chr "{env.R_HOME}" #>  $ env        :List of 3 #>   ..$ hello      : chr "world" #>   ..$ RSQLite_db : chr ":memory:" #>   ..$ system_path: chr "path: {env.PATH}" #>  $ connections:List of 2 #>   ..$ :List of 2 #>   .. ..$ con    : chr "adam_fs" #>   .. ..$ backend:List of 3 #>   .. .. ..$ type       : chr "connector_fs" #>   .. .. ..$ path       : chr "{metadata.root_path}/{metadata.trial}/adam" #>   .. .. ..$ extra_class: chr "{metadata.extra_class}" #>   ..$ :List of 2 #>   .. ..$ con    : chr "general_dbi" #>   .. ..$ backend:List of 3 #>   .. .. ..$ type  : chr "connector_dbi" #>   .. .. ..$ drv   : chr "RSQLite::SQLite()" #>   .. .. ..$ dbname: chr "{env.RSQLite_db}" #>  $ datasources:List of 2 #>   ..$ :List of 2 #>   .. ..$ name: chr "adam" #>   .. ..$ con : chr "adam_fs" #>   ..$ :List of 2 #>   .. ..$ name: chr "sdtm" #>   .. ..$ con : chr "general_dbi" config <- read_yaml_config(yaml_file) str(config) #> List of 4 #>  $ metadata   :List of 4 #>   ..$ trial      : chr "demo_trial" #>   ..$ root_path  : chr "/home/runner/work/_temp/Library/connector" #>   ..$ extra_class: chr "world" #>   ..$ R          : chr "/opt/R/4.4.1/lib/R" #>  $ env        :List of 3 #>   ..$ hello      : chr "world" #>   ..$ RSQLite_db : chr ":memory:" #>   ..$ system_path: chr "path: /opt/hostedtoolcache/pandoc/3.1.11/x64:/snap/bin:/home/runner/.local/bin:/opt/pipx_bin:/home/runner/.carg"| __truncated__ #>  $ connections:List of 2 #>   ..$ :List of 2 #>   .. ..$ con    :List of 1 #>   .. .. ..$ : chr "adam_fs" #>   .. ..$ backend:List of 3 #>   .. .. ..$ type       : chr "connector_fs" #>   .. .. ..$ path       : chr "/home/runner/work/_temp/Library/connector/demo_trial/adam" #>   .. .. ..$ extra_class: chr "world" #>   ..$ :List of 2 #>   .. ..$ con    :List of 1 #>   .. .. ..$ : chr "general_dbi" #>   .. ..$ backend:List of 3 #>   .. .. ..$ type  : chr "connector_dbi" #>   .. .. ..$ drv   : chr "RSQLite::SQLite()" #>   .. .. ..$ dbname: chr ":memory:" #>  $ datasources:List of 2 #>   ..$ :List of 2 #>   .. ..$ name: chr "adam" #>   .. ..$ con : chr "adam_fs" #>   ..$ :List of 2 #>   .. ..$ name: chr "sdtm" #>   .. ..$ con : chr "general_dbi" Sys.getenv("hello") #> [1] "world"
